message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with image filtering, denoising, and upsampling, which are all topics related to computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also mentions edge-preserving smoothing, which falls under the category of graphics (cs.GR). The proposed framework involves optimization techniques, which can be categorized under machine learning (cs.MM) and optimization (cs.LG). Finally, the paper mentions the use of data-driven parameter optimization, which can be categorized under information theory (cs.IT).
